data.merged_despite_failed_checks: Yes. The PR was merged by viktorsomogyi on Mar 14, 2025 despite 1 failing check (CI/build/Collate Test Catalog). input.notes: PR #18994 references Jira ticket KAFKA-18843 in its title. The Jira ticket is a Bug with Status: RESOLVED, Resolution: Fixed, Fix Version: 4.1.0, Component: mirrormaker. It describes the issue where MirrorMaker2 uses sourceAndTarget.toString() as workerId, making all worker IDs the same across the distributed herder. The PR was merged despite the CI/build/Collate Test Catalog check failing, as it was a CI infrastructure issue unrelated to the code changes.
